thread.title: 'Fat' Matt Damon beefs with 'talentless' Oscars host Jimmy Kimmel | Metro News
thread.title_full: 'Fat' Matt Damon beefs with 'talentless' Oscars host Jimmy Kimmel | Metro News

author: Olivia Waring For Metro.Co.Uk
title: 'Fat' Matt Damon beefs with 'talentless' Oscars host Jimmy Kimmel | Metro News
text:
Olivia Waring for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 2:20 am Jimmy and Matt have already started beefing at the Oscars and it’s been brutal (Pictures: YouTube) 
The longtime feud between Matt Damon and Oscars host Jimmy Kimmel didn’t take long to kick off during the ceremony. 14-times Oscar-nominated La La Land ‘heading to the West End’ as it was ‘made for the stage’ 
Chat show host Jimmy stuck the boot in early and called Matt fat during his opening speech, in which he falsely claimed he wanted to ‘bury the hatchet’. 
‘I’ve known Matt so long that when I first met Matt, I was the fat one,’ he joked. 
He also ribbed Matt over the fact he didn’t take a role in Oscar-nominated Manchester By The Sea, as he instead chose to perform in ‘Chinese ponytail movie’ (The Great Wall). To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video Matt didn’t seem to be enjoying the roasting (Picture: YouTube) 
But the first word went to Matt, who said on the red carpet of Jimmy: ‘He’s talentless himself. Unfortunately, he’s got an incredible group of writers who work for him. So I’m afraid. 
‘I think I’m in for it tonight.’
